 2001-20142001-11-010,  ,  FIN,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the DISCLOSURE OF INTEREST (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS by specifying that Trust and Loan companies must provide customers who open an interest-earning deposit account with a written statement that sets out the rate of interest payable thereon and how it is to be calculated.
